data.actual_result: The arrow almost touches the timestamp.
data.expected_result: The arrow is a bit far away.
data.short_description: The expand arrow is oddly close to the time/time duration stamp in an audit log entry. [Small screened devices specific]
data.steps_to_repro: - Change the colour of a role many times (or do anything that creates audit log entries that show a time period). - Open Audit log. - Observe how the expand arrow is oddly close to the time duration/period.
